ProjectRoot.TagLine: Authenticate your FubuMVC applications to keep the riffraff out
ProjectRoot.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication
PublishedNuget.Description: Extensible authentication behaviors (with sensible defaults) for your FubuMVC application.

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication.Serenity
PublishedNuget.Description: Reusable LoginScreenFixture for projects that use FubuMVC.Authentication

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication.Twitter
PublishedNuget.Description: Extends the FubuMVC.Authentication Bottle and provides integration with Twitter authentication.

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Authentication.Windows
PublishedNuget.Description: Adds windows authentication to a FubuMVC application.

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.PersistedMembership
PublishedNuget.Description: A simple recipe for adding forms based membership persistence to a FubuMVC application
